mean_cn: n. 描绘，描写，叙述，种类
mean_en: a statement that tells you how something or someone looks, sounds, etc.; words that describe something or someone
word_etyma: de表加强 + script写 + ion名词后缀 → description 描述
sentence: The policeman asked the girl to give a description of the criminal.
sentence_trans: 警察让女孩描述一下罪犯的样子。
